name: The Big Elk
description:
The Big Elk is a crazy top-down shooter from Siberia with elements of action RPG and strategy.

The Evil came into the Forest... Are you Hero or not? If YES, you must save the Forest!

  • Build structures!
  • Think of your strategy!
  • Solve the puzzles!
  • Kill all!
  • Stay alive!

Bonus. The Original Soundtrack.
All tracks available as 320kbp/s MP3 files in the game folder on your PC.

The universe is on your side...
Good luck Hero!
